title: Cornell Template
author: AFFiNE
md:
# Cornell Notes Template


Study smarter with the Cornell Notes Template, your new best friend in academic success. Suitable for students of all ages and subjects, this template takes the famous Cornell Note-Taking System and makes it simple and easy to use, whether you prefer Google Docs, Word or a PDF.


Walk into your next class or meeting with a tool that organizes your thoughts and helps you understand and retain information. The Cornell Notes Template is just that - a structured and efficient way of note taking that has helped thousands of students and professionals.


## Why the Cornell Notes Template?


For students and professionals alike, the Cornell Notes Template gets you engaged with the material. By dividing your notes into 3 sections - cues, notes, and summaries - it helps you focus on the main ideas and make connections, and learning becomes more fun.


### Better Retention Through Structure


The Cornell Notes Template is all about the layout. On the right, the "Notes" section is where you write down the details during the lecture or meeting. On the left, the "Cues" section is where you reflect on the key points or questions, and get more engaged. At the bottom, the "Summary" section is where you summarise your understanding and reinforce the information in your brain.


### Flexible for any learning style


Whether you're a visual learner who likes to use color coding or a verbal learner who prefers written words, this template fits your style. It's available in Google Docs, Word and PDF so you can drop it into your current note taking habits no matter what platform you use.


### A Tool for All Ages and Subjects


From middle school students doing their first research project to college students studying for finals, and even professionals attending workshops - the Cornell Notes Template is a universal tool. It's great for breaking down complex topics into smaller chunks, so you can absorb information across all subjects.


### Study Smarter


Imagine studying for exams with ease, thanks to the notes you've taken using the Cornell template. No more trudging through pages of messy scribbles. Instead you have concise notes to review quickly. This saves time and reduces study stress.


The Cornell Notes Template isn't a product, it's your partner to academic and professional success. With its simple design and evidence based structure, it's a must have for anyone who wants to take their note taking to the next level. Try out the different formats today and find the one that suits you best.
